metadata.title: CVE-2018-19535 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In Exiv2 0.26 and previous versions, PngChunk::readRawProfile inpngchunk_int.cpp may cause a denial of service (application crash due to aheap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted PNG file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19535` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.4
libexiv2-14 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.4').
